jcr:content.jcr:title: List of High Court Judges of Northern Ireland

contentheadline.headline: List of High Court Judges of Northern Ireland

contentrichtext.text: This is a '''list of [[High Court judge]]s of [[Northern Ireland]]''', arranged by order of appointment, as of 10 September 2012: #The Hon Mr Justice Gillen #The Hon Mr Justice Weatherup #The Hon Mr Justice Weir #[[Donnell Deeny|The Hon Mr Justice Deeny]] #The Hon Mr Justice Treacy #The Hon Mr Justice Stephens #The Hon Mr Justice McCloskey #[[Paul Maguire (politician)|The Hon Mr Justice Maguire]] #[[Thomas Horner (judge)|The Hon Mr Justice Horner]] # ''Vacant'' ==References== *{{Cite web|url=http://www.courtsni.gov.uk/en-GB/AboutUs/OrganisationalStructure/Pages/Judiciary-of-Northern-Ireland.aspx|title=Salaried Judicial Complement|date=14 May 2012}} ==See also== * [[Lord Chief Justice of Northern Ireland]] * [[List of Lords Justices of Appeal of Northern Ireland]] [[Category:Northern Ireland law-related lists|High Court Judges]] [[Category:High Court judges of Northern Ireland| ]] [[Category:Lists of people from Northern Ireland by occupation|High Court Judges]] [[Category:Lists of judges in the United Kingdom]]
